Title: The Pothole
Plot: Elaine wants to have some Chinese food delivered, but lives just outside the delivery zone.  In order to fool the delivery man, she pretends that the janitor closet in the building across the street is her apartment.  The trouble is the landlady mistakes her for the janitor.  Kramer joins the "adopt a highway" program, but his methods are a little unorthodox.  Jerry's new girlfriend uses a toothbrush that had fallen into the toilet, which causes him more trouble than he could have imagined.  Geo
GuestStars: Wayne Knight, Kristin Davis, Jack McGee, George Kee Cheung, Seraiah Carol, Radmar Agana Jao, Walter Addison
